body:
Sjoerd Hardeman wrote: 
> Johannes Wiedersich schreef: 
> May I advertise arXiv for this purpose? http://arxiv.org/ 
arXiv is a nice website. I tried it, but there is already a repo for my 
university. Thanks. 
 
 
-- 
Merciadri Luca 
See http://www.student.montefiore.ulg.ac.be/~merciadri/ 
I use PGP. If there is an incompatibility problem with your mail 
client, please contact me. 
 
 
Instruction ends in the schoolroom, but education ends only with life. 
(F. W. Robertson)
subject: Re: Plagiarism (was Re: PDF is blocked for ...)
